text: Geantraí () is an Irish television programme, presenting Irish traditional music.https://www.irishtimes.com/newspaper/archive/1996/1111/Pg022.html#Ar02208:1746A31C36B9 The name derives from Geantraí, one of the three types of Irish music enumerated in the "three noble strains"; geantraí (joy music), suantraí (lullaby) and goltraí (sorrow music). In Old Irish, they were spelled geantraige, suantraige, goltraige. ==References== == External links == *Official site Category:Irish-language television shows Category:1990s Irish television series Category:2000s Irish television series Category:2010s Irish television series Category:TG4 original programming Category:1996 Irish television series debuts Category:Irish folk music
title: Geantraí
